Articles.Content:
Is there any guide anywhere on how to do this? I've put a docking port on a ship the wrong way round and could do with some advice on how to fix it.

I think I've found the entry for it in the file, but changing rotation doesn't seem to do anything.

Edited June 2, 2013 by Richy teh space man
There are 4 values for rotation, have you tried all of them?

There are 4 values for rotation, have you tried all of them?

Yeah I've tried those thanks but it doesn't seem to do anything. It's as if the part is locked in place or something. For now I'll keep playing around with it..
Never mind, just going to hyperedit a fix instead. Problem solved lolz
